text: Mpe tolandisaki sima na bango batindami na biso, mpe tolandisaki Issa mwana ya Maryam mpe topesaki ye indjil mpe totiaki boboto mpe ngolu o mitema ya baye balandaki ye. Kasi kimupe oyo bazalaki na yango na sima, totindaki bango kosala yango te, kasi baluka nde bosepeli ya Allah, mpe basalelaki yango te ndenge esengelaki, na yango, topesaki baye bandimi kati na bango lifuta na bango.
